timeline.bodyText: These stats are still used for adaptive replica selection. This is what I meant when we discussed this about the QueueResizingEsThreadPoolExecutor working for both the little's law part (the part we wanted to remove) as well as for adaptive replica selection.
timeline.author: dakrone

replies.bodyText: You're absolutely right. I was too eager to delete code here. Will be interesting to see if any test catches this. Will rework this PR tomorrow.
replies.author: ywelsch

timeline.message: weaken assertion to accomodate tests that mock threadpool
